column4: more than a back-up I don't think so :)
what do you use to resize?
well if those data are written on a disk... you have a filesystem
I can lose data during this long process of resizing ? :)
during a resize, depending on the user approach, you manipulate the structure of the filesystem, which means you might damage it, and be unable to retrieve your data
But what can I do instate of Backup ?
keep the data there till my end of my life ?
